doc:
Lee Bowman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Bowman 0 Lee Bowman (December 28, 1914 – December 25, 1979) was an American film and television actor. According to one obituary, "his roles ranged from romantic lead to worldly, wisecracking lout in his most famous years". Lee_Bowman ( December_28_,_1914 – December_25_,_1979 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . According to one_obituary , " his_roles ranged from romantic_lead to worldly_,_wisecracking_lout in his_most_famous_years " .
